solution_line_template: On Monday, there were {visitors_monday} visitors. On Tuesday, there were twice as many, so {tuesday_multiplier}*{visitors_monday} = {visitors_tuesday} visitors
The total number of visitors after Tuesday will be {visitors_tuesday}+{visitors_monday} = <<{visitors_tuesday}+{visitors_monday}={total_mon_tue_visitors}>>{total_mon_tue_visitors} visitors.

For the remaining {remaining_days_count} days, an average of {average_visitors_other_days} visitors attended, giving a total of {remaining_days_count}*{average_visitors_other_days} = <<{remaining_days_count}*{average_visitors_other_days}={visitors_other_days_total}>>{visitors_other_days_total} visitors.

The total number of visitors who visited the library for the week was {visitors_other_days_total}+{total_mon_tue_visitors} = <<{visitors_other_days_total}+{total_mon_tue_visitors}={total_weekly_visitors}>>{total_weekly_visitors} visitors.
